obfuscation: ﻿At the age of 20 , I nowadays look back at my English studies and it seems unreal that ten years have gone by since I was in the 4th grade , which was my first year of English .
original: ﻿At the age of 20, I now look back at my English studies and it seems unreal that ten years have gone by since I was in the 4th grade, which was my first year of English.

obfuscation: I can however remember how we sang `` John Brown '' and practiced the colors by writing a book .
original: I can still remember how we sang "John Brown" and practiced the colors by writing a book.

obfuscation: Everybody also had to choose a name from an English speaking area .
original: Everybody also had to choose a name from an English speaking country.

obfuscation: Most of my classmates had a name from the American soap opera `` Dallas '' , such as Pamela , Bobby , and Jenna .
original: Most of my classmates had a name from the American soap opera "Dallas", such as Pamela, Bobby, and Jenna.

obfuscation: I was called Patricia , a name , which my mom came up with .
original: I was called Patricia, a name, which my mom came up with.

obfuscation: These are my inaugural memories from studying English .
original: These are my first memories from studying English.

obfuscation: In elementary school , English was more a game than a national and I loved it .
original: In elementary school, English was more a game than a subject and I loved it.

obfuscation: In middle school I started with German and I felt that my English was neglected , which actually worried me .
original: In middle school I started with German and I felt that my English was neglected, which really worried me.

obfuscation: German was hard but very logical and I knew and understood the grammar .
original: German was hard but very logical and I knew and understood the grammar.

obfuscation: I could tell the German prepositions in my sleep , whereas I did not know anything about the English prepositions .
original: I could tell the German prepositions in my sleep, whereas I did not know anything about the English prepositions.

obfuscation: After middle school I began to dream of a school year abroad .
original: After middle school I began to dream of a school year abroad.

obfuscation: I made up my mind as I started eminent school , not only because I was worried about my English skills , but also because I longed for adventure .
original: I made up my mind as I started high school, not only because I was worried about my English skills, but also because I longed for adventure.

obfuscation: Thanks to my parents this dream became truthful in 1996 .
original: Thanks to my parents this dream became true in 1996.

obfuscation: After my second year of high school I left for Indiana , U.S.A. My motion for this paper is : what have I learned during these ten years of studying English ?
original:
After my second year of high school I left for Indiana, U.S.A. 
My question for this paper is: what have I learned during these ten years of studying English?

obfuscation: Which are my strengths and weaknesses in the four skills of listening , reading , speaking , and writing ?
original: Which are my strengths and weaknesses in the four skills of listening, reading, speaking, and writing?

obfuscation: As a result of my school year in the U.S. my ears have become very familiar with the sound of the English language at an everyday level , specially American English .
original: As a result of my school year in the U.S. my ears have become very familiar with the sound of the English language at an everyday level, especially American English.

obfuscation: My time abroad forced me to actually listen and pay attention to what people said .
original: My time abroad forced me to really listen and pay attention to what people said.

obfuscation: Since everything was in English I learned precisely by living there .
original: Since everything was in English I learned just by living there.

obfuscation: I do not have a problem understanding spoken English at an everyday level , but I am very mindful of the differences in levels and I know that I still have a long way to go .
original: I do not have a problem understanding spoken English at an everyday level, but I am very aware of the differences in levels and I know that I still have a long way to go.

obfuscation: When it comes to reading the school in Sweden spent quite some time on that , at least at the eminent school level .
original: When it comes to reading the school in Sweden spent quite some time on that, at least at the high school level.

obfuscation: Studying in the U.S.A .
original: Studying in the U.S.A.

obfuscation: I also had to do a lot of reading , which I sometimes found unmanageable , especially in classes such as government and economics , since there were so many terms that I was not familiar with .
original: I also had to do a lot of reading, which I sometimes found difficult, especially in classes such as government and economics, since there were so many terms that I was not familiar with.

obfuscation: I do fine reading novels and I have learned to use the context when there are words that I do not know .
original: I do fine reading novels and I have learned to use the context when there are words that I do not know.

obfuscation: I enjoy reading novels in English , but I find it harder to understand shorter texts .
original: I enjoy reading novels in English, but I find it harder to understand shorter texts.

obfuscation: possibly I need more information to really get it .
original: Perhaps I need more information to really get it.

obfuscation: A time limit stresses me and I tend to read too fast ; that is probably why I have a trouble with short stories , and I never did as good as I wanted to on reading and comprehension tests in high school .
original: A time limit stresses me and I tend to read too fast; that is probably why I have a problem with short stories, and I never did as good as I wanted to on reading and comprehension tests in high school.

obfuscation: Due to my time in the U.S.A. with the Americans my spoken English grew tremendously .
original: Due to my time in the U.S.A. with the Americans my spoken English developed tremendously.

obfuscation: I did not understand how much my school English had changed until my sisters came to see me ; I had then been in the U.S.A. for one semester .
original: I did not realize how much my school English had changed until my sisters came to see me; I had then been in the U.S.A. for one semester.

obfuscation: Listening to their English I understood that my English had been given an American touch .
original: Listening to their English I understood that my English had been given an American touch.

obfuscation: I learned to use fresh words and speak although I was not sure that it was correct .
original: I learned to use new words and speak although I was not sure that it was correct.

obfuscation: I came to the point where I let myself to make mistakes and I let people laugh at me .
original: I came to the point where I allowed myself to make mistakes and I let people laugh at me.

obfuscation: Sometimes my tongue actually got twisted and I said the craziest things , yet my mistakes taught me more than I would ever have learned if I had been quiet .
original: Sometimes my tongue really got twisted and I said the craziest things, yet my mistakes taught me more than I would ever have learned if I had been quiet.

obfuscation: Speaking English sometimes makes me anxious , and in a strange way I feel more relaxed speaking English with , or in front of , English native speakers than I do with my countrymen .
original: Speaking English sometimes makes me nervous, and in a strange way I feel more relaxed speaking English with, or in front of, English native speakers than I do with my countrymen.

obfuscation: Writing is the skill in which I have not had very much practice , not even in the U.S.A. since the tests were constantly made up of matching or multiple choice questions .
original: Writing is the skill in which I have not had very much practice, not even in the U.S.A. since the tests were always made up of matching or multiple choice questions.

obfuscation: My third , and last , class of high school in Sweden I took a class called `` English C '' and there we actually practiced writing .
original: My third, and last, year of high school in Sweden I took a class called "English C" and there we actually practiced writing.

obfuscation: We wrote formal letters , personal notes , leaflets , and book reviews .
original: We wrote formal letters, personal notes, leaflets, and book reviews.

obfuscation: I get a lot of practice by my own since I have thus many friends in the U.S.A. to whom I frequently write letters and e-mail messages .
original: I get a lot of practice by my own since I have so many friends in the U.S.A. to whom I frequently write letters and e-mail messages.

obfuscation: A big problem that I have when I write is that I neither feel comfortable with my spelling , nor my grammar .
original: A big problem that I have when I write is that I neither feel comfortable with my spelling, nor my grammar.

obfuscation: In early words : I really need more writing exercises .
original: In other words: I really need more writing exercises.

obfuscation: Finally , I want to point out that I have learned a lot during these ten years but still ten years is a long time and I find that I could have learned more than I did .
original: Finally, I want to point out that I have learned a lot during these ten years but still ten years is a long time and I feel that I could have learned more than I did.

obfuscation: My year in the U.S.A. has given my English an American touch and it also gave me the willingness to study English at the university .
original: My year in the U.S.A. has given my English an American touch and it also gave me the willingness to study English at the university.

obfuscation: I can listen , read , speak , and write English at an everyday level .
original: I can listen, read, speak, and write English at an everyday level.

obfuscation: I can survive and survive a normal life in an English speaking country .
original: I can survive and live a normal life in an English speaking country.

obfuscation: However , I want more that that and I know that the way is long !
original: However, I want more that that and I know that the way is long!
